products.name: Wireless Headphones
products.description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation and 20-hour battery life.

reviews.comment: Great sound quality and comfortable fit!
Battery life is good, but could be better.

products.name: Smart Watch
products.description: Stylish smartwatch with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and fitness tracking features.

reviews.comment: I love the design and the fitness tracking is spot on.
Works well, but GPS accuracy could be improved.

products.name: 4K Ultra HD TV
products.description: Experience stunning visuals with this 55-inch 4K Ultra HD TV with HDR support.

reviews.comment: Amazing picture quality, worth every penny!
Great TV, but the remote control feels a bit cheap.
